description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play MiniGolf like you've never done before ! Complete the to 20 challenging holes placed into 4 unfeasible scenarios: a city , a medieval castle , a beach and a farm ...  A fully 3D environment with physics of the ball near real, bonus for time and score and 'strange' animated obstacles. Try to center the holes if you can ...
